page.description: Public user defined function. The EMAIL_POP_CLOSE() function attempts to gracefully close a connection with a POP3 server.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The connection was closed gracefully. .F. = The connection was forced closed with .CLOSE().

argument.name: pSocket
argument.description: A pointer variable that is populated by EMAIL_POP_OPEN().
